payload.name: harvest-now-decrypt-later
payload.title: Harvest-now-decrypt-later: confidentiality lifetimes matter
payload.formal: adversary records ciphertext now, decrypts later when capabilities improve.
payload.apm2_mapping: the evidence store and telemetry are extremely sensitive. Classification and retention (already present in evidence module) are non-negotiable: store only what you must, for as short as you can, and encrypt according to confidentiality lifetime.
